name: Nickel Creek Platinum Corp.
longDescription: Nickel Creek Platinum Corp is a Canadian involved in mining exploration, evaluation, and development of platinum group metal and nickel mineral properties. The company mainly operates through its Yukon Territory property in Canada. It generates most of its revenue through the sale of its metals deposit, while it also engages in the acquisition, evaluation, research, and development of mining properties.
